query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

project.title: TRUstworthy Multi-site Privacy Enhancing Technologies

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Assessment of hydrogen certification while using waste-heat and steam from industrial applications
result.description: The assessment includes the existing green hydrogen certification as defined within the CertifHy project Phase 2 and analyses possibilities and methodologies to apply this on an integrated HTE utilizing steam and heat sources from industry The investigation will reveal if and how the CertifHy methodology can be applied for integrated HTE systems and identifies barriers for potential market penetration in order to derive suggestions for decision makers

project.title: Multimegawatt high-temperature electrolyser to generate green hydrogen for production of high-quality biofuels

programme.title: Increase the energy efficiency of production of hydrogen mainly from water electrolysis and renewable sources while reducing operating and capital costs, so that the combined system of the hydrogen production and the conversion using the fuel cell system can compete with the alternatives for electricity production available on the market

result.title: Initial CSP, DEP and synergies establishment
result.description: Initial CSP DEP and synergies establishment Website and first report that explains how TRUMPET will communicate its developments and outcomes how the consortium will ensure visibility and promotion of the project and dissemination of its results throughout the project and finally how an exploitation strategy is developed This report also will show the EUlevel roadmapping and outreach strategy IRST CEA ALL

result.title: Multi-Dimensional Conceptual EPME Model and Research Agenda for Validation - v1
result.description: A conceptual model of perception, emotion-regulation, decision-making and action in demanding and stressful situations will be modeled and described. A research agenda to validate the conceptual model with human factor studies will be outlined (v1).The created conceptual model will be validated, by testing the various premises of the model in real-world and virtual environment experiments (final).

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: SoA and BSoA for FL-tailored AI models, PET methods and tool
result.description: SoA and BSoA for FL-tailored AI models, PET methods and tools will contain the results of T1.1 and T2.1. The deliverable will contain the selection of the AI models and central aggregation methods for the FL setting, as well as an in-depth analysis of state of the art and improvements of the PET methods and SW tools for FL scenarios. [UVIGO, GRAD, TVS, AVO, INRIA]
